HeroSection.title: Logistics made easy and profitable
HeroSection.subtitle: Obsydian automates invoice auditing, detects errors and manages claims to maximize your logistics savings

ProjectsSection.title: How we make you save
ProjectsSection.paragraph: Obsydian is based on improving efficiency in logistics billing management.
ProjectsSection.case1Desc: Retail company recovers €45,000 annually by detecting fuel surcharges and incorrect rates in their domestic shipments.
ProjectsSection.case2Desc: Logistics company reduced audit time by 30% and increased error detection rate by 85% in international invoices.
ProjectsSection.case3Desc: Industrial manufacturer automated 100% of their claims and improved cost visibility in their supply chain.

ProductFeatureSection.title: Transform your logistics with AI
ProductFeatureSection.paragraph: From demand forecasting to customs clearance, our AI agents automate every aspect of your logistics operations
ProductFeatureSection.feature1Desc: Let AI predict what you need before you know it. It learns from your sales, seasonality, and trends to prevent stockouts and overstock.
ProductFeatureSection.feature2Desc: AI reads and understands your shipping documents—like BoLs, PODs, delivery notes, invoices, and customs forms and updates it in your systems so you don't have to.
ProductFeatureSection.feature3Desc: Our AI syncs your systems: ERP, TMS, WMS, PDF, CSV and external data seamlessly. No more silos, no more delays, just real-time flow.
ProductFeatureSection.feature4Desc: AI analyzes past performance, pricing, claims, and contract terms to help you choose the right carrier every time, data beats guesswork.
ProductFeatureSection.feature5Desc: You describe the shipment, our agent quotes, compares, recommends, and books the best option, all in seconds and autonomously.
ProductFeatureSection.feature6Desc: Automate the most painful part of global shipping. Our AI handles customs documents, broker coordination, and clearance smoothly.
ProductFeatureSection.feature7Desc: Stay in control with real-time location tracking, predictive alerts in case of incidences, and instant updates.
ProductFeatureSection.feature8Desc: Never miss an overcharge. Our agent checks invoices, detects errors, and even files and follows up on claims for you.
